channel.title: Greetings from the 3rd World
channel.description:
Hey bootstrapped, this is Mike, from Mexico.
I'm an entrepreneur building projects. I've been launching different projects in the last few months, but I always encounter issues to get the first customers without unpaid marketing.
The one that I'm working on at this time is "iSawDesign". It's an unlimited web design and graphic design service for startups
I'm really good when it comes to Google Ads and Facebook campaigns, but I've found it to be nearly impossible to invest in these when targeting the US market.
If you have any advice as to how y'all have acquired the first few customers, please share the knowledge :smiley:
Mike

item.title: Greetings from the 3rd World
item.dc:creator: mkezmkez
item.description:
Hey bootstrapped, this is Mike, from Mexico.

I’m an entrepreneur building projects. I’ve been launching different projects in the last few months, but I always encounter issues to get the first customers without unpaid marketing.

The one that I’m working on at this time is “iSawDesign”. It’s an unlimited web design and graphic design service for startups

If you have any advice as to how y’all have acquired the first few customers, please share the knowledge
